Get in touch with us
2010 2013
2010 2013

Live-Tech’s SkyWorker 2010 suite features, hosted Exchange 2010, Lync 2010, SharePoint 2010 & SkyNox. Its the complete hosted email and collaboration solution.

SkyWorker suite brings you unmatched migration, customizable plans and industry-leading customer care you won’t find anywhere else. Take a look at our plans to find out which one perfectly fits your needs.

Live-Tech SkyWorker 2010 Ultimate Plan includes

  • All ‘Professional Plan’ Features
  • Unlimited GB Mailbox Size
  • Unlimited ActiveSync
  • BlackBerry Synchronization
  • Email Archiving
  • Email Disclaimer
  • Public Folders (100MB per user up to 2GB per org. max)
  • Resource Mailbox (1 Per Plan to max. 3 per Org.)
  • VIP Customer Support

  • See Live-Tech SkyWorker Professional Plan
